units.rationale: Specifies the use of the iTracer system to trace cell lineages.

units.title: 4D light-sheet microscopy for dynamic assessment
units.text: We also leverage 4D light-sheet microscopy to provide an assessment of clonal and morphological dynamics as the neuroepithelium develops at the onset of brain regionalization.
units.rationale: Outlines the imaging method to monitor clonal and morphological changes over time.

units.title: Integrate CRISPR perturbation
units.text: We incorporated CRISPR-based gene perturbation into the lineage-recorder system.
units.rationale: Adds gene editing capability to the lineage recording workflow.

units.title: Construct dual-channel iTracer recorder
units.text: We established a dual-channel lineage recorder called iTracer by coupling a complex barcode library together with an inducible Cas9 scarring system.
units.rationale: Describes the creation of the iTracer recorder combining barcodes and inducible scarring.

units.title: Introduce iTracer via electroporation
units.text: We introduced the iTracer construct by electroporation into iPSCs that contain a doxycycline-inducible Cas9 cassette (iCRISPR).
units.rationale: Details the delivery method for the iTracer construct into stem cells.

units.title: Isolate reporter‑positive cells
units.text: Fluorescent cells containing the reporter can be isolated using flow cytometry before being propagated or cryopreserved for later use.
units.rationale: Provides a step for selecting cells that express the lineage reporter.

units.title: Induce Cas9 scarring with doxycycline
units.text: Doxycycline introduction into the medium induces Cas9 expression in organoid cells, followed by formation of Cas9–gRNA complexes, leading to double‑stranded break formation at the target location in the fluorescent reporter region of the recorder.
units.rationale: Explains how doxycycline triggers Cas9 activity to generate scars for lineage marking.

units.title: Quantify barcode diversity by scRNA‑seq
units.text: We measured barcode diversity using scRNA‑seq data from three iTracer iPSC pools and found approximately 60,000 unique sequences.
units.rationale: Describes the assessment of barcode complexity using single‑cell transcriptomics.

units.title: Track barcode changes with amplicon sequencing
units.text: We followed barcode diversity throughout organoid development using targeted amplicon sequencing of the barcode region.
units.rationale: Outlines longitudinal monitoring of barcode composition during organoid growth.

units.title: Optimize doxycycline scarring conditions
units.text: We tested the duration and concentration of doxycycline treatment; we found scarring was most efficient when samples were incubated with 8 µg ml−1 doxycycline for 24 h and applied these conditions in all subsequent experiments.
units.rationale: Provides the optimized doxycycline protocol for maximal scarring efficiency.
